name: Crusaders: Mission Adventure
overview: Crusaders Mission Adventure is an RPG / adventure that seems to have elements that set it apart from other similar games. In it you are a missionary in a land inhabited by 3 tribes, each with its own distinct culture. Your task is to get to know the people and help them to make a religious connection with Christianity. Your time and money is limited, so use it wisely. As in real life, you will likely need a notebook, a journal and a set of scriptures. Additionally persistence and bravery will come into play.
